EmailTemplate.name: Wave 11 Barnet Graduation Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! Graduate from NCS this weekend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Well done on completing NCS with The Challenge!
To celebrate your amazing achievements, you are invited to graduate and collect your NCS graduation pack, this weekend.
The ceremony will take place at: Arts Depot 5 Nether Street North Finchley N12 0GA
Sunday 18th October 2.30pm - 4pm. Don't be late.
You may bring one guest into the ceremony.
If you are unable to attend, please let us know by emailing and confirming your postal address so we can send you your graduation pack.
Congratulations again!
All the best,
The Team at NCS with The Challenge
